  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private static String add_update_menu_item()
    Add or update an item to the item_list (menu) This function will ask for following input - item name - item price - item type - item description
    private static String add_update_menu_itemSet()
    Add or update an promotion to the set_list (menu) This function will ask for following input - set name - set items - set items should be input with specified delimiter ( Item:Quantity;Item: Quantity) - set price - set description
    static void menu_item_operation()
    This function should either add/update/remove item to/from item_list (menu) choice: - 0: exit - 1: add item - 2: update item - 3: remove item
    static void menu_set_operation()
    This function should either add/update/remove promotion to/from set_list (menu) choice: - 0: exit - 1: add promotion - 2: update promotion - 3: remove promotion
    static void menu_ui()
    Menu Manager Interative UI, can do following options Choice: - 0: EXIT - 1: Create/Update/Remove Menu Item - 2: Create/Update/Remove Menu Set - 3: Show Menu A-la-carte - 4: Show Menu Promotions
    private static void print_item_list()
    This function will print items in the hash map by using Item's own toString() function
    static void print_item_not_found​(String item_name)
    This function is ought to be used in MenuManager Class Print out the error message with correct item name
    static void print_menu_item()
    Print out the menu with items that are grouped by Category with pretty borders
    static void print_menu_set()
    Print out the menu with sets with sets' own toString methods
    private static void print_set_list()
    This function will print sets in the hash map by using Set's own toString() function
    private static String remove_menu_item()
    remove an item form item_list (menu) This function will ask user to input item name to be removed
    private static String remove_menu_item_itemSet()
    remove an promotion form set_list (menu)

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • menu_ui

      public static void menu_ui() throws IOException
      Menu Manager Interative UI, can do following options Choice: - 0: EXIT - 1: Create/Update/Remove Menu Item - 2: Create/Update/Remove Menu Set - 3: Show Menu A-la-carte - 4: Show Menu Promotions
      Throws:
      IOException - inherited from `readConfigFile` function

    • menu_item_operation

      public static void menu_item_operation() throws IOException
      This function should either add/update/remove item to/from item_list (menu) choice: - 0: exit - 1: add item - 2: update item - 3: remove item
      Throws:
      IOException - to handle `clear_console()` function

      String carries task completion status

    • menu_set_operation

      public static void menu_set_operation() throws IOException
      This function should either add/update/remove promotion to/from set_list (menu) choice: - 0: exit - 1: add promotion - 2: update promotion - 3: remove promotion
      Throws:
      IOException - to handle `clear_console()` function

    • add_update_menu_itemSet

      private static String add_update_menu_itemSet()
      Add or update an promotion to the set_list (menu) This function will ask for following input - set name - set items - set items should be input with specified delimiter ( Item:Quantity;Item: Quantity) - set price - set description
      Returns:
      String carries task completion status

      public static void print_item_not_found​(String item_name)
      This function is ought to be used in MenuManager Class Print out the error message with correct item name
      Parameters:
      item_name - is the name of the item that is not found on menu
